proposal: Diving into the world of BAL Gauges, it's clear you're all about empowering your community through governance and innovative liquidity solutions. With 22 holders in the ETH network, you're setting a solid foundation. 📊 Why not amplify this with tools that let your community not just participate but also create? Imagine deploying your own DEX or engaging in a community-driven lottery. Our B2B tools are here to mesh seamlessly with your vision, making the Balancer ecosystem even more vibrant. Let's make governance not just about decisions, but about creation too.
